rect.style: stroke-width: 1.07; stroke: none; stroke-linecap: square; stroke-linejoin: miter; fill: #595959; fill-opacity: 0.20;
stroke-width: 1.07; stroke: none; stroke-linecap: square; stroke-linejoin: miter; fill: #595959; fill-opacity: 0.20;

g.text: Number of people arriving each week
Showing weekly number of arrivals sponsored by individuals and by the Scottish and Welsh Governments
Grey shaded areas show pauses in Government 'super sponsor' schemes.
Spikes in arrivals could lead to spikes in destitution 6 to 12 months later
Source: British Red Cross analysis of DLUHC data
